document_data.name: ''Drums of Deafening''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Drums of deafening''''' were enchanted musical instruments that shattered eardrums when struck.
document_data.Description: These kettle [[drum]]s came in a pair. Each had a diameter of {{SI|1'6|'"|c|long=yes}}.
document_data.Powers:
Nothing would happen if only one of the drums was struck. However, if both drums were struck at the same time all living creatures within {{SI|70|ft|long=yes}} of the drums were permanently [[deaf]]ened. Anything within {{SI|10|ft|long=yes}} of the drums was also severely stunned. The deafness could be restored if the shattered eardrums were magically ''[[heal]]ed''.

[[Bard]]s could invoke the magic of each drum separately, striking one to stun nearby creatures and striking the other drum to deafen creatures.
document_data.Notable Owners: A pair of ''drums of deafening'' could be found within the [[Ring of Venerable Contemplation]] in [[Kuo Meilan]] in the [[Hordelands]].
